title: [HOLD for payment 2024-07-25] [$250] Split- Unknown user profile loads infinitely when opening from split confirmation page offline
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go offline.
3. Go to FAB > Split expense > Scan.
4. Upload a receipt.
5. Select an unknown account (non-existing account or never interacted with before account).
6. Proceed to confirmation page.
7. Click on the unknown account.

Expected result: The user profile of the unknown account will not load infinitely.

Actual result: None
html_description:

Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go offline. 3. Go to FAB > Split expense > Scan. 4. Upload a receipt. 5. Select an unknown account (non-existing account or never interacted with before account). 6. Proceed to confirmation page. 7. Click on the unknown account. ## Expected Result: The user profile of the unknown account will not load infinitely. ## Actual Result: The user profile of the unknown account loads infinitely. ## Workaround: unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [x] Android: Native - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: Native - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/38435837/e0e2bf2e-0478-4e27-b201-0afc2ecb4bd4 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
